mapper.sql: id, projecthistory, projectcurrent, projectstarttime, projectplan, projectdifficulty, projectsuggestion, submitTime
id, projecthistory, projectcurrent, projectstarttime, projectplan, projectdifficulty, projectsuggestion, submitTime,projectid,projectname
mapper.select: select Weekly.id ,weekly.projecthistory,weekly.projectcurrent, weekly.projectstarttime,weekly.projectplan,weekly.projectdifficulty,weekly.projectsuggestion,weekly.submitTime from Weekly,RelationProjectWeekly where Weekly.id=RelationProjectWeekly.weeklyid and RelationProjectWeekly.projectid=#{projectid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

select Project.projectname,Project.projectid,Weekly.*, Project.bidregion,Project.department,Project.projectcharger,Project.projectestimateamount,Project.projectgeneral from Weekly,RelationProjectWeekly,Project where Weekly.id=RelationProjectWeekly.weeklyid and RelationProjectWeekly.projectid=Project.projectid;

select Project.projectname,Project.projectid,Weekly.*, Project.bidregion,Project.department,Project.projectcharger,Project.projectestimateamount,Project.projectgeneral from Weekly,RelationProjectWeekly,Project where Weekly.id=RelationProjectWeekly.weeklyid and RelationProjectWeekly.projectid=Project.projectid
and Weekly.submitTime >=#{starttime} and Weekly.submitTime < dateadd(d, 7, #{starttime}) order by Weekly.submitTime

select Project.projectname,Project.projectid,Weekly.*, Project.bidregion,Project.department,Project.projectcharger,Project.projectestimateamount,Project.projectgeneral from Weekly,RelationProjectWeekly,Project where DATEDIFF(dd,Weekly.submitTime,GETDATE())<=7 and Weekly.id=RelationProjectWeekly.weeklyid and RelationProjectWeekly.projectid=Project.projectid;

select Project.projectname,Project.projectid,Weekly.*, Project.bidregion,Project.department,Project.projectcharger,Project.projectestimateamount,Project.projectgeneral from Weekly,RelationProjectWeekly,Project where DATEDIFF(dd,Weekly.submitTime,GETDATE())<=30 and Weekly.id=RelationProjectWeekly.weeklyid and RelationProjectWeekly.projectid=Project.projectid;
mapper.insert: insert into Weekly (id, projecthistory, projectcurrent, projectstarttime, projectplan, projectdifficulty, projectsuggestion, submitTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projecthistory,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{projectcurrent,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{projectstarttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{projectplan,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{projectdifficulty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{projectsuggestion,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update Weekly
projecthistory = #{projecthistory,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

projectstarttime = #{projectstarttime,jdbcType=DATE},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Weekly set projecthistory = #{projecthistory,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, projectcurrent = #{projectcurrent,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, projectstarttime = #{projectstarttime,jdbcType=DATE}, projectplan = #{projectplan,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, projectdifficulty = #{projectdifficulty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, projectsuggestion = #{projectsuggestion,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, submitTime = #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Project.projectname,Project.projectid,Weekly.id,Weekly.projecthistory,Weekly.projectcurrent from Weekly,RelationProjectWeekly,Project where Weekly.id=RelationProjectWeekly.weeklyid and RelationProjectWeekly.projectid=Project.projectid;
